data.name: Cloud Pirates - Collector's Pack "Exterminator"
data.detailed_description:
Captains, enhance your experience with a combination of premium ships, useful bonuses, rare currencies and shiny vanity items. Because why captain a ship when you can’t have the best one!


The contents of this DLC pack will be delivered straight to your account after you purchase them from Steam and log into the game the next time (please relog, if the game is running while you make your purchase). Sometimes the delivery can take a few minutes, so be patient while those freighters haul your booty into the bay.


Show your fellow Captains that you don't only have big cannonballs, but that you also have the style that distinguishes you from the common pirates. These sails and stickers will make you stand out in any fight.


Crush your enemies, witness them breaking before you, and hear the cries of despair from there crew. The Exterminator is a tier 3 premium frigate packing one hell of a punch.




What's a real pirate without a load of gems in his storage room? These 500 rubies will be available for you to spend freely in the ingame shop.


Time is precious, so you need to make sure to use it as best as you can. These 7 days of Premium Time let you collect double the rewards from your battles.


Do you also feel like you never have enough space to store your treasure maps? Let us help you by expanding your storage by a whooping four additional slots. Now where to get more treasure maps!?

data.short_description: Captains, enhance your experience with a combination of premium ships, useful bonuses, rare currencies and shiny vanity items. Because why captain a ship when you can’t have the best one!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Polish
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP Service Pack 3 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.1 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8600 GT, 256 MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Broadband Connection with 128kb/s or more bandwidth.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 Service Pack 1 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad 2.2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Broadband Connection with 128kb/s or more bandwidth.
